name: Society to Create Awareness on Public Safety
briefDescription: We, at SCAPS (Society to Create Awareness on Public Safety) an NGO working on public safety education doing our part to educate and motivate people , in specific we are targeting children to follow traffic rules and understand different safety preparedness steps to follow in an eventuality and behave orderly in public life and keep our city clean. In our endeavor to develop the teaching  material on safety education, we made a short film made based on realtime experience  "Why can't we?"! and is available in our web site to view. We are working on developing multilingual website and study material (books) already published in English,Hindi,Telugu and Tamil along with free downloadable safety posters are being developed on continuously. Taki
